content:
Supplier Diversity

Lancaster City Council's Herfindahl-Hirschman Index (HHI) score of 118.4 indicates a highly competitive and diverse supplier market. For comparison:

CouncilHHI ScoreConcentration
Lancaster118Low
Ribble Valley171Low
Pendle265Low
Rossendale327Low
South Ribble495Low
Burnley366Low
Hyndburn506Low-Moderate
Chorley2,131Moderate

A lower HHI means spending is more evenly distributed across suppliers, reducing dependency on any single provider and generally indicating better competition.

Companies House Red Flags

Our Companies House cross-check identified 8 suppliers with potential compliance concerns totalling Â£167,700 in payments. These include suppliers with dissolved or dormant company statuses at the time of payment.

See the full analysis on our DOGE Investigation page.
